section.title: Importing a Report
section.para: Reports are stored in the VMDB; however, you can share customized reports among VMDBs. To do this use the export and import feature of reports.

step.para: In the [label]#Import/Export# accordion, click Custom Reports.
In the Import area, click Browse to select an import file.
To overwrite an existing report with the same menu name, select Overwrite existing reports.
Click Upload to import the report to the Company-Custom folder.
